author: VNExplorer
title: Hot weather, possible dry lightning, in Shuswap weather forecast
text: With a heat warning blanketing large swaths of B.C.‚Äôs Southern Interior, the Columbia Shuswap Regional District says Friday‚Äôs weather could also feature dry lightning. Environment Canada is predicting sunny skies and temperatures between 30 C and 34 C for the Shuswap for the next week. For Friday, though, there‚Äôs a risk of thunderstorms for the region in the afternoon and evening. 2:07 Canada wildfires: Thousands under evacuation orders across western provinces ‚ÄúThe cooler, wetter weather pattern has now shifted back to hot and dry conditions, including the possibility for dry lightning in the Shuswap over the coming days,‚Äù said the regional district. ‚ÄúThis could result in new fires starting in the area.‚Äù Breaking news from Canada and around the world sent to your email, as it happens. Get breaking National news For news impacting Canada and around the world, sign up for breaking news alerts delivered directly to you when they happen. By providing your email address, you have read and agree to Global News' Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy. The CSRD says residents should be prepared for possible evacuation alerts or orders if a wildfire starts burning in their area. ‚ÄúHave grab-and-go bags ready and make an emergency plan for people and pets,‚Äù said the regional district. In other news, the Mara Mountain blaze was sized at 290 hectares as of Thursday, the same size it was listed at on Saturday. However, the lightning-caused fire is still deemed to be out of control as it burns roughly six km southeast of Sicamous. 2:12 Tourism operators report fewer visitors in Central Okanagan And because it‚Äôs still burning, the CSRD is asking boaters to stay clear of helicopters that are bucketing water from the Two Mile and Swansea Point areas of Mara Lake. Fire growth is said to be minimal, with 21 firefighters on scene. ‚ÄúRecreational boaters are making their job more difficult by boating where helicopters are filling their buckets in Mara Lake. We are asking all boaters to stay away from this area,‚Äù said the regional district. ‚ÄúIf boaters see active helicopter traffic, please move along. Mara and Shuswap lakes are very large, so there‚Äôs plenty of space to boat safely without disrupting firefighting efforts.‚Äù More on Canada

author: LMNeuquen
title: II Jornadas Norpatag√≥nicas: La innovaci√≥n en la producci√≥n de Bioim√°genes
text:
La ciudad de Neuqu√©n se prepara para recibir las II Jornadas Norpatag√≥nicas sobre ‚ÄúLa Innovaci√≥n en la Producci√≥n de Bioim√°genes‚Äù . Ser√°n dos d√≠as de intensas actividades, charlas y disertaciones de expertos. Las jornadas se llevar√°n a cabo el viernes 18 y s√°bado 19 de octubre, de 8 a 14, en la Honorable Legislatura de la Provincia de Neuqu√©n , en Dr. Luis Federico Leloir 810 en Neuqu√©n capital.
Este evento, organizado por Leben Salud y la Universidad de Flores (UFLO) , est√° dirigido a t√©cnicos radi√≥logos, licenciados en Producci√≥n de Bioim√°genes, m√©dicos residentes y especialistas en diagn√≥stico por im√°genes.
El objetivo principal es promover la investigaci√≥n y la innovaci√≥n en el campo de las bioim√°genes , ofreciendo a los asistentes un espacio propicio para el conocimiento, el intercambio y el desarrollo, lo que contribuir√° al avance cient√≠fico y acad√©mico del sector.
Declarada de inter√©s cultural provincial por la Honorable Legislatura del Neuqu√©n , la jornada contar√° con la presencia de autoridades locales pol√≠ticas, junto al doctor Alejandro Schroeder, director m√©dico de la Fundaci√≥n M√©dica de R√≠o Negro y Neuqu√©n, quien dirige la Comisi√≥n Acad√©mica y Cient√≠fica del evento, acompa√±ado por un selecto grupo de docentes, m√©dicos y profesionales del √°rea.
bioimagenes jornadas1.jpg Este evento cuenta con el respaldo de la Asociaci√≥n Argentina de Oncolog√≠a Cl√≠nica y empresas de prestigio como Siemens, Philips, Laboratorios Bacon, Bayer, Tecnoimagen, Colombo Servicios M√©dicos S.R.L, FAARDIT, SAR y SOMIT, ediciones Journal, entre otras.
Las jornadas renuevan su compromiso con la excelencia acad√©mica , tras el √©xito de la primera edici√≥n, que reuni√≥ a m√°s de 150 asistentes presenciales y 200 virtuales.
Los objetivos institucionales de la jornada incluyen crear un espacio para el intercambio de conocimientos y el desarrollo de nuevas tecnolog√≠as en bioim√°genes, facilitando el intercambio de experiencias entre profesionales del √°rea.
√öltimos avances Adem√°s, se busca actualizar a los participantes sobre los √∫ltimos avances en diagn√≥stico por im√°genes y tratamientos, promover la formaci√≥n continua y fomentar la colaboraci√≥n multidisciplinaria para mejorar la calidad de atenci√≥n al paciente.
Se abordar√° un detallado y completo programa que apunta a ofrecer oportunidades para establecer contactos profesionales y compartir mejores pr√°cticas, explorar enfoques emergentes, como la inteligencia artificial y la medicina de precisi√≥n, y promover la investigaci√≥n cient√≠fica en imagenolog√≠a m√©dica.
Durante la primera jornada , la charla inaugural ser√° sobre ‚ÄúASPECTS e Inteligencia Artificial. Conceptos y pr√°cticas en Tomograf√≠a Computarizada de Cr√°neo‚Äù. Se desarrollar√°n diversas tem√°ticas a lo largo de la jornada y se finalizar√°, el primer d√≠a, con una charla sobre ‚ÄúEndometriosis, diagn√≥stico avanzado por resonancia magn√©tica‚Äù.
El s√°bado 19 las actividades se pondr√°n en marcha a las 8:30 con una disertaci√≥n sobre ‚ÄúEntero TC y RMN: Soluciones Diagn√≥sticas Avanzadas en Im√°genes M√©dicas‚Äù. Durante esta jornada se abordar√°n tem√°ticas ligadas a ‚ÄúCuerpos extra√±os‚Äù e ‚ÄúIntervencionismo diagn√≥stico en oncolog√≠a‚Äù, entre otras, y se finalizar√°n con charlas sobre Inteligencia Artificial y Actualizaci√≥n en PET-CT .
092024_II_JornadasNorpatagonica_.pdf A las 14 llegar√° el cierre de las II Jornadas sobre Producci√≥n de Bioim√°genes.
Los organizadores invitaron a todos los interesados a participar en esta jornada fundamental que, sin duda, contribuir√° al desarrollo de las bioim√°genes en la regi√≥n.
Para m√°s informaci√≥n, pueden acceder al link de inscripci√≥n: II Jornada Norpatag√≥nica: La innovaci√≥n en la producci√≥n de bioimagenes | UFLO Universidad. (https://www.uflo.edu.ar/ver-agenda-884-ii-jornada-norpatagonica:-la-innovacion-en-la-produccion-de-bioimagenes.php)
La ciencia detr√°s de un preciso diagn√≥stico ¬øQu√© son las bioim√°genes? Son im√°genes m√©dicas que permiten visualizar el interior del cuerpo humano. Estas im√°genes se obtienen a trav√©s de diversas t√©cnicas, como la radiolog√≠a convencional, tomograf√≠a computada, la mamograf√≠a y la resonancia magn√©tica, entre otras.
Su principal objetivo es proporcionar informaci√≥n detallada sobre la anatom√≠a y el funcionamiento de los √≥rganos y tejidos, lo que resulta fundamental para el diagn√≥stico preciso de enfermedades y su posterior tratamiento.
Te puede interesar...

author: Yolco
title: #3 La inflaci√≥n golpea m√°s a las clases bajas, pero subir tipos es a√∫n peor
text:
[ikipol](/user/ikipol)a [elconfidencial.com](/go/link/3969494)
Desigualdad y empobrecimiento no son lo mismo. En Cuba son todos muy iguales y muy pobres.
Pero igual la √∫nica causa de la inflaci√≥n est√° en el estado y el banco central (la FED) ni deber√≠a existir.
¬øCu√°l era la inflaci√≥n acumulada en los √∫ltimos 100 a√±os antes de la existencia de la FED? Ya os lo digo: no daba ni 0%, era negativa (-20%).
Las clases bajas tienen pocos activos que se revaloricen, y ahorran en 'dinero' en el banco.
Mientras que las clases altas no ahorran su patrimonio en 'dinero' sino que invierten en activos no monetarios (y si pueden diversifican: acciones, inmuebles, metales preciosos, criptomonedas, etc....).
Por tanto, resulta evidente que al aumentar la inflaci√≥n (aka el precio de los productos = reducci√≥n del valor real del dinero) pues los ricos est√°n mucho m√°s protegidos.
La inflaci√≥n es un impuesto para pobres, y los mantiene en la pobreza.
Y si nos vamos a casa extremos de hiperinflaci√≥n como en Venezuela o Argentina pues a ver qui√©n es el guapo que sale de pobre..

author: Isto√â News
title: Ednaldo apresenta chapa para CBF com apoio de todas as 27 federa√ß√µes e 13 clubes da S√©rie A
text:
A chapa ‚ÄúPor um Futebol Mais Inclusivo e Sem Discrimina√ß√£o de Qualquer Natureza‚Äù, formada por Ednaldo Rodrigues (candidato a presidente), Ricardo Nonato Macedo de Lima, Reinaldo Rocha Carneiro Bastos, Gustavo Oliveira Vieira, Gustavo Dias Henrique, Ednailson Leite Rozenha, Ant√¥nio Roberto Rodrigues G√≥es da Silva, Leomar de Melo Quintanilha e Rubens Renato Angelotti (candidatos a vice-presidentes), foi a √∫nica apresentada, nesta quarta-feira, √† Comiss√£o Eleitoral da CBF para a elei√ß√£o da pr√≥xima segunda-feira que determinar√° os ocupantes dos cargos de presidente e vice-presidentes da CBF de mar√ßo de 2026 a mar√ßo de 2030.
A chapa contou com a subscri√ß√£o das 27 federa√ß√µes estaduais e de 13 clubes da S√©rie A e outros 13 da S√©rie B. ‚ÄúFoi uma uni√£o democr√°tica, um processo eleitoral que segue um rito estabelecido pela Fifa, Conmebol e CBF, dentro do seu estatuto, e para o qual tivemos significativas subscri√ß√µes. Foram 27 federa√ß√µes e tamb√©m 13 clubes da S√©rie A e 13 clubes da S√©rie B. Com isso, a gente vai procurar fazer um mandato que busque cada vez mais o fomento do futebol brasileiro, lutando pela purifica√ß√£o desse futebol e pela inclus√£o social e principalmente no combate ao racismo e a todo tipo de discrimina√ß√£o‚Äù, disse o presidente Ednaldo, em entrevista √† CBF TV.
‚ÄúAs federa√ß√µes t√™m um papel fundamental nesse processo, √© como se fosse uma CBF em cada Estado. Tamb√©m n√£o posso deixar de registrar o significativo apoio dos clubes. Temos os que subscreveram a chapa e a totalidade dos que se manifestaram apoiando esse mandato, os 20 da S√©rie A e os 20 da S√©rie B. Isso tamb√©m mostra que o nosso compromisso √© com a transpar√™ncia, com a coisa certa e o compromisso que o futebol brasileiro tenha paz e que todos possamos marchar juntos para tornar o futebol brasileiro mais unido ainda‚Äù, afirmou o dirigente.
Ednaldo completou ao dizer que o combate ao racismo ser√° um dos principais objetivos. ‚ÄúPor um Futebol Mais Inclusivo e Sem Discrimina√ß√£o de Qualquer Natureza‚Äù √© um tema que a CBF sempre vai defender, a gente tem visto esses crime acontecerem n√£o s√≥ no futebol, como em outros setores da sociedade, mas o futebol √© um instrumento forte e que podemos usar para combat√™-los, com penas desportivas que possam ser aplicadas, como j√° determina a CBF, a primeira entidade e a tomar tal medida, que foi aprovada pela Fifa e hoje se estende a todas as federa√ß√µes nacionais filiadas.‚Äù

author: Scott Keepfer
title: South Carolina equals wins record, tops Arkansas in SEC Tournament
text: Collin Murray-Boyles helps South Carolina equal season wins record vs Arkansas in SEC Tournament Collin Murray-Boyles scored 24 points as [South Carolina basketball](https://www.greenvilleonline.com/sports/usc/) topped Arkansas, 80-66, Thursday afternoon in an SEC Tournament second-round game at Bridgestone Arena in Nashville, Tennessee. The Gamecocks (26-6), the tournament‚Äôs No. 5 seed, advance to face No. 4 seed Auburn in a quarterfinal game on Friday (3:30 p.m., ESPN). Arkansas (16-17) earned a berth opposite South Carolina by outlasting Vanderbilt 90-85 in overtime in a first-round game on Wednesday. Arkansas coach Eric Musselman suffered the first sub.-500 finish of his career. It was a considerably better day for second-year South Carolina coach [Lamont Paris](https://gamecocksonline.com/sports/mbball/roster/coach/lamont-paris/), who reportedly agreed to a new six-year deal that will pay him more than $4 million per year. After going 11-21 last season, Paris‚Äô team won its 26th game, tying for the most wins in a season in program history. The Gamecocks won an SEC Tournament game for the first time since 2018 and are a lock for the NCAA Tournament for the first time since 2017. Sparked by Collin Murray-Boyles, who had 12 first-half points, the Gamecocks went on a 14-4 run to take a 17-15 lead on a 3-pointer by Miles Stute. The Gamecocks went into the half with a 38-35 advantage courtesy of a runner by Meechie Johnson at the buzzer. The Gamecocks opened the second half with a 10-0 run to expand the lead to 13 and the Razorbacks never drew closer than six points the rest of the game. Collin Murray-Boyles continued superb play Murray-Boyles, who was named to the SEC All-Freshman Team on Monday, showed why on Thursday. Murray-Boyles had 24 points in the win against Arkansas, making 11-of-14 shots from the floor. He has scored in double figures in 10 of South Carolina‚Äôs last 11 games and is shooting 69% over that span. ‚ÄúYou should always feel like nobody can guard you, and that‚Äôs how I felt tonight,‚Äù Murray-Boyles said. Gamecocks flexed defense, dominant inside game South Carolina‚Äôs inside prowess was evident on Thursday. The Gamecocks outscored Arkansas 52-38 in the paint and outrebounded the Razorbacks, 33-26. South Carolina‚Äôs inside brawn also resulted in 19 second-chance points to just six such points for Arkansas. Murray-Boyles, who‚Äôs 6-foot-7, and 6-8 B.J. Mack combined for 16 rebounds and 43 points. Josh Gray, a 7-foot, 265-pound senior, came off the bench to contribute eight points, two rebounds and two assists. The Gamecocks‚Äô defense also was superb after a rough start and forced 14 turnovers. B.J. Mack regained shooting touch at right time Mack, South Carolina‚Äôs graduate transfer from Wofford, struggled in the Gamecocks‚Äô final three games of the regular season, scoring in single digits in each game and totaling only 16 points in the three contests. But he found the range on Thursday, scoring 19 points on 5-of-9 shooting from the floor. He made 2-of-4 shots from 3-point range and all seven of his free throws. The team‚Äôs inside-out game worked to perfection. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs crucial,‚Äù Mack said. ‚ÄúHim (Murray-Boyles) doing all the work on the inside, then me stretching the floor really opens up everything for us.‚Äù Scott Keepfer covers Clemson athletics for The Greenville News and the USA TODAY Network. Email him at [skeepfer@gannett.com](mailto:skeepfer@gannett.com) and follow him on X, formerly known as Twitter, @ScottKeepfer

author: Avi Shravan
title: "Set that mf off": Angel Reese, Caitlin Clark & more shower Lexie Hull with love after Fever star soaks in Unrivaled triumph
text:
') > -1) { addClass($('.section-container'), 'pill-tag'); } Follow Us Share 0 Discuss 0 Discuss What's your opinion? "Set that mf off": Angel Reese, Caitlin Clark & more shower Lexie Hull with love after Fever star soaks in Unrivaled triumph Discuss Now Angel Reese, Caitlin Clark & more shower Lexie Hull with love after Fever star soaks in Unrivaled triumph. (Image Source: Getty) Angel Reese , Caitlin Clark and more WNBA stars showered love on Lexie Hull's latest Instagram post. On Tuesday, the Indiana Fever guard shared a few pictures of herself from her championship celebration with the Rose BC at Unrivaled.
Ad The Fever guard became the inaugural champion of the 3x3 basketball league alongside her Rose teammates which included Angel Reese. The cover picture on Hull's post featured her holding the Unrivaled trophy.
"winning is fun!!" Ad Trending Clark, Reese and others dropped in the post's comment section to express their love for their peer's win.
"Nice caption," Caitlin Clark commented. "set that mf off BIG LEXIE," Angel Reese commented. "Big Le ," Chelsea Gray commented. "Yea Lex üî•" Natasha Cloud commented. "This is awesome!!! üî•üî•" Katie Lou Samuelson commented. Clark, Reese and more comment on Lexie Hull's IG post. (Credits: @lexiehull/Instagram) The Rose BC secured the Unrivaled championship on Monday after defeating the Vinyl BC 62-54. Hull played only four minutes in the championship game and had no contributions.
Ad However, the Fever guard averaged 6.4 points, 3.0 rebounds and 1.6 assists per game off the bench in her first season.
Lexie Hull expresses her excitement at seeing Caitlin Clark's growth Lexie Hull has grown close with Caitlin Clark after the rookie joined the Fever last season. They spent time together in the offseason before Hull ventured off into Unrivaled, and eight weeks later, she walked away as the inaugural champion.
Ad On Monday, Hull spoke with Sportskeeda's Mark Medina in an exclusive interview where she expressed her thoughts on a lot of subjects. During one segment, Hull mentioned Clark's growth in her sophomore season.
"She‚Äôs had such a great rookie season, but she‚Äôs only going to get better,‚Äù Hull told Sportskeeda. ‚ÄúEspecially with a player like that that is eager to learn and continue to get better. The sky is the limit . " Lexie Hull and Clark are the two core members of the Fever squad with Aliyah Boston completing the mix. The Fever front office has worked hard this offseason to bring in experienced talents like DeWanna Bonner, Natasha Howard and Sophie Cunnigham to bolster their chance of winning a championship next season.

author: Reporter
title: Thunder, lightning and hail: Unsettled weather ahead - Limerick Live
text: File image Met √âireann have forecast a Friday that might turn wintry, with thunder and a chance of lightning. This Friday will start fresh and increasingly breezy with a mix of sunshine and showers. Showers will mainly affect western and northern areas at first, but will spread across the country during the day on a strong westerly breeze. Some of the showers will be heavy with hail and a slight chance of lightning. Later in the day, showers may turn wintry on high ground. Highest temperatures of 7 to 10 degrees. Fresh & increasingly breezy today with a mix of sunshine and showersÔ∏è‚Äî Met √âireann (@MetEireann) Some of the showers will be heavy with hail and the slight chance of lightning‚òîÔ∏è Highs of 7 to 10C [pic.twitter.com/9M07a7xRDm] [March 22, 2024] A cold and windy Friday night with a mix of clear spells and showers, some of the showers will be heavy and prolonged with hail and thunder possible. Some wintry falls are possible, mainly over the hills. Lowest temperatures of 1 to 4 degrees in fresh to strong westerly winds. A touch of frost is likely in some sheltered spots. Saturday will be a fairly windy day with a mix of sunny spells and showers with the continued chance of hail and thunder. Some wintry falls are possible in the morning on high ground. Highest temperatures of 7 to 10 degrees, but feeling colder. author: Roc√≠o Mu√±oz-Ledo
title: Gobierno de Biden amenaza con demandar a Texas por su nueva ley de inmigraci√≥n
text:
(CNN) -- El Departamento de Justicia de Estados Unidos amenaz√≥ con demandar a Texas por su nueva ley de inmigraci√≥n en una carta enviada este jueves, seg√∫n una copia que CNN obtuvo del documento. Esto supone la escalada m√°s reciente entre el presidente Joe Biden y el gobernador de Texas, el republicano Greg Abbott, sobre la gesti√≥n de la frontera entre EE.UU. y M√©xico.
A principios de este mes, Abbott promulg√≥ una ley, conocida como SB4, que otorga a las autoridades locales la facultad de detener a los inmigrantes y a los jueces la capacidad de emitir √≥rdenes para deportarlos de Estados Unidos.
La nueva ley de inmigraci√≥n de Texas siembra confusi√≥n e incertidumbre a lo largo de la frontera
La Casa Blanca critic√≥ la ley, al calificarla de "incre√≠blemente extrema". Se espera que entre en vigor en marzo.
En una carta dirigida a Abbott, el Departamento de Justicia argument√≥ que la medida "se antepone y viola la Constituci√≥n de EE.UU." y tambi√©n amenaza con afectar la capacidad del gobierno federal para hacer cumplir la ley de inmigraci√≥n.
"En consecuencia, Estados Unidos tiene la intenci√≥n de presentar una demanda para impedir la aplicaci√≥n de la SB4 a menos que Texas acceda a abstenerse de implementar la ley. Estados Unidos se ha comprometido tanto a asegurar la frontera como a garantizar el procesamiento de los no ciudadanos de conformidad con la Ley de Inmigraci√≥n y Nacionalidad (INA). La ley SB4 es contraria a estos objetivos", afirma la carta, firmada por el subsecretario adjunto Brian Boynton.
¬øC√≥mo es la nueva ley de Texas que penaliza la entrada irregular de migrantes al estado? Las claves de la pol√©mica ley SB4
La amenaza legal de este jueves se produce despu√©s de que el Departamento de Justicia demandara a Texas por el uso de boyas flotantes en el r√≠o Grande. La demanda sigue su curso en los tribunales.
